verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* meaning?

\w That|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w use|strong="H0398"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w sour|strong="H1155"\w* \w grapes|strong="H1155"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* set \w on|strong="H5921"\w* edge.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* mine: \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w so|strong="H4191"\w* also \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* mine: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* sinneth, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* neighbour’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* menstruous \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wronged|strong="H3238"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w debtor|strong="H2326"\w*, hath \w taken|strong="H1497"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* violence: hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*:

Hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lent \w upon|strong="H4941"\w* \w usury|strong="H8636"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*: hath withdrawn \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* hath executed \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*:

Hath \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* commandments, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w surely|strong="H1980"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* robber, \w a|strong="H3205"\w* shedder \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w some|strong="H0428"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*:

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* eateth \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* defileth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3808"\w* grieveth \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* taketh \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* violence, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* restoreth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* lifteth \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* committeth \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* giveth \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w usury|strong="H8636"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* taketh \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*: \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H0428"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*? \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*. Seeing \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8441"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w*, \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* afraid, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neighbour’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* grieved \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* withholden \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H1497"\w* \w away|strong="H1497"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* violence, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*:

\w That|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* injuring \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w usury|strong="H8636"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w executed|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* commandments: \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w living|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* offered \w violence|strong="H6233"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* wrought \w evil|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* own \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*? Verily, \w because|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* hath wrought \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, hath \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* commandments, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, living, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* sinneth, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* penance \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* commandments, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, living \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* iniquities \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath wrought, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H1870"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* sinner should \w die|strong="H4194"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* should \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w converted|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* according \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* useth \w to|strong="H4191"\w* work, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* live? \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* justices \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*: \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* prevarication, \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath prevaricated, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.
